CreateNewDeformableRegistration.description:
CreateNewDeformableRegistration(..)
  Action for adding a new deformable registration based on 
  information stored in files. Used from scripting (see 
  Dev01\CoreApps\ScriptClient\InternalScripts\import_deformableregistration.py).
  Parameters:
    ReferenceExaminationName - Gets or sets the name of the 
      reference examination.
    TargetExaminationName - Gets or sets the name of the 
      target examination.
    RegistrationName - Gets or sets the name of the structure 
      registration.
    RigidTransformDF - Gets or sets the rigid transform for 
      the deformable registration.
    RigidTransformFoR - Gets or sets the rigid transform for 
      the frame-of-reference registration.
    FromFrameOfReference - Gets or sets the the from 
      frame-of-reference
    ToFrameOfReference - Gets or sets the the to 
      frame-of-reference
    GridCorner - Gets or sets the deformation grid corner.
    GridVoxelSize - Gets or sets the deformation grid voxel 
      size.
    NrOfVoxels - Gets or sets the deformation grid size.
    DisplacementField - Gets or sets the displacement field.

CreatePlanExploration.description:
CreatePlanExploration(..)
  Creates a new plan exploration.
  Parameters:
    Name - The name of the plan exploration.
    ExaminationName - The name of the planning examination to 
      use for the plan exploration.
    Description - A description of the plan exploration.
    PlannedBy - Name of the planner of this exploration.

MapPoiGeometriesDeformably.description:
MapPoiGeometriesDeformably(..)
  Map POI geometries according to selected deformable 
  registration(s).
  Parameters:
    PoiGeometryNames - The names of the POI geometries to map.
    CreateNewPois - If true: for each PoiGeometry selected to 
      be mapped, a new POI is created with geometries (points) 
      defined in both the reference and the target image. The 
      geometry in the reference image is the same as the original 
      and the geometry in the target image is the mapped geometry. A 
      suffix is added to the POI name.
      If false: for each PoiGeometry selected, a geometry (point) is 
      created in the target image corresponding to the mapped 
      position.
      Default is false.
    StructureRegistrationGroupNames - The name(s) of the 
      deformable registration group(s) to use for mapping.
    ReferenceExaminationNames - The name(s) of the image(s) 
      where the deformation field(s) is defined.
    TargetExaminationNames - The name(s) of the image(s) that 
      the deformation field(s) points to.
    ReverseMapping - If true, geometries defined on the target 
      image are mapped to the reference image.
      If false, geometries defined on the reference image are mapped 
      to the target image.
      Default value is false.
    AbortWhenBadDisplacementField - If true, geometries will 
      not be mapped if inverted deformation grid elements are 
      detected.
      Default value is false.

DeleteRegistrationCreatedByTreatmentPosi.description:
DeleteRegistrationCreatedByTreatmentPositionAlignment(..)
  Method for deleting frame-of-reference registration created by 
  treatment position alignment.
              
  This method is for experimental use - use with care.
  Parameters:
    FromFrameOfReference - From frame-of-reference
    ToFrameOfReference - To frame-of-reference string

CreateTreatmentPlanFromValidationDataSet.description:
CreateTreatmentPlanFromValidationDataSet(..)
  Creates an electron or ion treatment plan from a data set.
  This action is experimental - use with care
  Parameters:
    ValidationDataSet - Validation data set should be in the 
      form of a dictionary with the fields listed below. Some fields 
      are specific for either electron or ion plans.
                  
      PhantomName           - The name of the phantom to be used in 
      the plan
      Plan                  - This field contains information about 
      the treatment plan which will be created
        Name                - The name of the created plan
        Modality            - Treatment modality
        MachineName         - The name of the machine to be used in 
      the plan
        TreatmentTechnique  - Treatment technique: 
      "ApplicatorAndCutout" for electrons, "DoubleScattering", 
      "UniformScanning", "Wobbling", "PencilBeamScanning" or 
      "LineScanning" for ions (only PBS for carbon ions) 
        Beams               - List of beams with each beam 
      containing the information below
          Name                        - Name of the beam
          MonitorUnits                - Number of monitor units
          SourceToSurfaceDistance     - Source to surface distance 
      in [cm] (only for electrons)
          BeamQualityName             - Beam quality, e.g. "E04" 
      where the nominal energy is 4 MeV (only for electrons)
          ApplicatorName              - Name of the applicator to be 
      used in the plan (only for electrons)
          IsoCenterToSurfaceDistance  - Isocenter to phantom surface 
      distance in [cm] (only for ions)
          SnoutName                   - The name of the snout to be 
      used (only for ions)
          SnoutPosition               - The snout position in [cm] 
      (only for ions)
          PrescribedSOBPRange         - The prescribed SOBP range in 
      [cm] (only for passive ions)
          PrescribedSOBPWidth         - The prescribed SOBP 
      modulation width in [cm] (only for passive ions)
          SpotTuneID                  - The fixed spot tune ID (only 
      for scanned ions)
          SpotSpacing                 - The distance in [cm] between 
      spots (only for scanned ions)
          NominalEnergy               - Nominal ion beam energy in 
      [MeV] (only for scanned ions)
          FieldSize                   - The side in [cm] of a 
      scanned quadratic field (only for scanned ions)
          SpotPositions               - The position of the spots 
      (only for scanned ions)
          SpotWeights                 - The weight of each point in 
      SpotPositions (only for scanned ions)
          Compensator                 - This field contains 
      information about range compensator (optional for passive 
      ions, may be omitted)
            MaterialName              - Name of the range 
      compensator's material
            Thickness                 - Thickness in [cm] of the 
      range compensator
          BlockAperture               - The block aperture in a ions 
      plan (required for passive ions) or cutout in an electron plan 
      (optional for electrons, may be omitted)
            Type                      - Type of block: "Quadratic", 
      "Rectangular" or "SquareRoundCorners"
            Dimension                 - Dimension of block in [cm], 
      e.g. [10, 10] (for quadratic) or [10,20] (for rectangular) or 
      [15, 0] (for circular blocks) 
            Position                  - Lower corner position of 
      block in [cm]. Can only be used for blocks with Type == 
      "Rectangular". Format [x,y]
            MaxRadius                 - Maximum allowed radius in 
      the isocenter plane in [cm]. Should be used for blocks with 
      Type == "SquareRoundCorners"
            Thickness                 - The thickness of the block 
      in [cm]
          NominalBeamEnergy           - The nominal beam energy 
      [MeV] (only for Sumitomo Wobbling beams)
          FirstScattererThickness     - The first scatter thickness, 
      i.e total thickness of used lollipops [cm] (only for Sumitomo 
      Wobbling beams)
          RidgeFilter                 - The name of the ridge filter 
      to be used (only for Sumitomo Wobbling beams)
      DoseComputationParameters       - This field contains 
      information about the dose computation parameters
          DoseEngineName              - The name of the dose engine 
      to be used: "ElectronMonteCarlo" (only for electrons), 
      "IonPencilBeam" (only for passive ions) or 
      "SpotWeightPencilBeam" (only for pbs ions) 
          DoseGridResolution          - The side of a cubic voxel in 
      [cm]
          NumberOfHistoriesPerCM2     - The number of histories per 
      cm2 (must be specified for both electrons and ions, it is 
      however only used for the ElectronMonteCarlo dose engine)

CopyExamination.description:
CopyExamination(..)
  Method that copies the examination with name ExaminationName to 
  a new examination with name
  NewExaminationName.
  Parameters:
    ExaminationName - Name of the examination to copy.
    NewExaminationName - Name of the new copied examination. 
      Must be unique and cannot exceed 64 characters.

CopyExplorationPlanToPlanList.description:
CopyExplorationPlanToPlanList(..)
  Copies an exploration plan to the treatment plan list.
  Parameters:
    PlanExplorationName - Name of the exploration that 
      contains the plan that shall be copied.
    ExplorationPlanName - Name of the plan to copy.
    NewTreatmentPlanName - Name of the new treatment plan.

TransformPointFromExaminationToExaminati.description:
TransformPointFromExaminationToExaminationUsingTotalTransform(..)
  Transforms a point (in DICOM patient coordinate system) from 
  FromExamination to ToExamination using the total transform 
  (combining frame-of-reference registration with additional rigid 
  transform if such exists).
  Parameters:
    FromExamination - Name of FromExamination
    ToExamination - Name of ToExamination
    Point - Point to transform (in DICOM patient coordinate 
      system)
  Returns:
    Transformed point (in DICOM patient coordinate system). 
    Returns null if no transform exists.

MapRoiGeometriesRigidly.description:
MapRoiGeometriesRigidly(..)
  Map ROI geometries according to selected transformation(s).
  Parameters:
    RoiGeometryNames - The names of the ROI geometries to map.
    CreateNewRois - If true: for each RoiGeometry selected to 
      be mapped, a new ROI is created with geometries defined in 
      both the reference and the target image. The geometry in the 
      reference image is the same as the original and the geometry 
      in the target image is the mapped geometry. A suffix is added 
      to the ROI name.
      If false: for each RoiGeometry selected a geometry is created 
      in the target image corresponding to the geometry mapped from 
      the reference image.
      Default is false.
    ReferenceExaminationName - The name of the image from 
      which the transformation(s) is defined.
    TargetExaminationNames - The name(s) of the image(s) that 
      the deformation field(s) points to.
    Transformations - The transformation(s) from the reference 
      image(s) to the target image(s).
      Transformations are given in homogeneous coordinates, e.g., 
      the identity transform is 
      {'M11' : 1, 'M12': 0, 'M13': 0, 'M14': 0, \
      'M21' : 0, 'M22': 1, 'M23': 0, 'M24': 0, \
      'M31' : 0, 'M32': 0, 'M33': 1, 'M34': 0,\
      'M41' : 0, 'M42': 0, 'M43': 0, 'M44': 1}

SetRigidTransformation.description:
SetRigidTransformation(..)
  Sets the rigid transformation between two examinations.
  Parameters:
    FromExaminationName - The name of the from examination 
      that defines the from frame of reference.
    ToExaminationName - The name of the to examination that 
      defines the to frame of reference.
    RigidTransformation - The rigid transformation. Defined by 
      three rotation angles, a rotation center, and a translation.
        RotationCenter - The pivot point for rotations [cm]. In 
      DICOM coordinates.
        RollDegrees - Rotation about the Inferior-Superios axis 
      (DICOM: z, IEC: y).
        PitchDegrees - Rotation about the Right-Left axis (DICOM: x, 
      IEC: x).
        YawDegrees - Rotation about the Posterior-Anterior axis 
      (DICOM: -y, IEC: z).
        Translation - The translation [cm]. In DICOM coordinates.
                  
      Example:
        RigidTransformation = 
        { 
          'YawDegrees': 0.5, 
          'PitchDegrees': -3.1, 
          'RollDegrees': 7.32, 
          'Translation': { 'x': 1.1, 'y': -3.2, 'z': 2.8 }, 
          'RotationCenter': { 'x': 0, 'y': 0, 'z': 0 } 
        }
                  
      The order of transformations is 
        (1) negative rotation center shift
        (2) yaw rotation about posterior-anterior axis
        (3) pitch rotation about right-left axis,
        (4) roll rotation about inferior-superior axis,
        (5) positive rotation center shift
        (6) translation
                  
      The matrix representing the rigid transformation is
                  
        M = T * Tc * R_roll * R_pitch * R_yaw * T-c, 
                  
      where T is a translation matrix representing Translation, Tc 
      and T-c are translation matrices 
      representing rotation center shifts, and R_roll, R_pitch, and 
      R_yaw are rotation matrices 
      representing the respective rotations.

MapRoiGeometriesDeformably.description:
MapRoiGeometriesDeformably(..)
  Map ROI geometries according to selected deformable 
  registration(s).
  Parameters:
    RoiGeometryNames - The names of the ROI geometries to map.
    CreateNewRois - If true: for each RoiGeometry selected to 
      be mapped, a new ROI is created with geometries defined in 
      both the reference and the target image. The geometry in the 
      reference image is the same as the original and the geometry 
      in the target image is the mapped geometry. A suffix is added 
      to the ROI name.
      If false: for each RoiGeometry selected a geometry is created 
      in the target image corresponding to the geometry mapped from 
      the reference image.
      Default is false.
    StructureRegistrationGroupNames - The name(s) of the 
      deformable registration group(s) to use for mapping.
    ReferenceExaminationNames - The name(s) of the image(s) 
      where the deformation field(s) is defined.
    TargetExaminationNames - The name(s) of the image(s) that 
      the deformation field(s) points to.
    ReverseMapping - If true, geometries defined on the target 
      image are mapped to the reference image.
      If false, geometries defined on the reference image are mapped 
      to the target image.
      Default value is false.
    AbortWhenBadDisplacementField - If true, geometries will 
      not be mapped if inverted deformation grid elements are 
      detected.
      Default value is false.

MapPoiGeometriesRigidly.description:
MapPoiGeometriesRigidly(..)
  Map POI geometries according to selected transformation(s).
  Parameters:
    PoiGeometryNames - The names of the POI geometries to map.
    CreateNewPois - If true: for each PoiGeometry selected to

CreateDefaultVSimPlan.description:
CreateDefaultVSimPlan(..)
  Adds a new treatment plan using the default machine specified in 
  ClinicDB. If the machine
  is not found, the first commissioned, non deprecated linac machine 
  in alpabethical order is used.
  Example:
    To create a plan: 
    case.CreateDefaultVSimPlan(Isocenter={ 'x': 0.0, 'y': 0.0, 'z': 
    0.0 },ExaminationName="CT 1")
  Parameters:
    Isocenter - Coordinates of isocenter
    ExaminationName - The name of the examination on which the 
      dose grid is defined.
  Returns:
    Warning message, if any.

SetMarginExpression.description:
SetMarginExpression(..)
  Sets a derived ROI expression representing a margin 
  (expansion/contraction). Should be followed by 
  UpdateDerivedGeometry in order to create the geometry for a 
  specific examination.
  Parameters:
    SourceRoiName - The name of the source region of interest.
    MarginSettings - The margin settings. Defines type (Expand 
      or Contract) and distances. All distances must be positive and 
      less than 15 cm.
      Example: MarginSettings = { 'Type': "Contract", 'Superior' : 
      0.0, 'Inferior': 1.0, 'Anterior': 1.0, 'Posterior': 0.1, 
      'Right': 0.0, 'Left': 2.3 }

GrayLevelThreshold.description:
GrayLevelThreshold(..)
  Gray level thresholding.
  Parameters:
    Examination - The examination.
    LowThreshold - The low threshold. The unit is in rescaled 
      pixel values, e.g. HU for CT. For PET images, PetUnit must be 
      specified.
    HighThreshold - The high threshold. The unit is in 
      rescaled pixel values, e.g., HU for CT. For PET images, 
      PetUnit must be specified.
    PetUnit - The unit for PET images. Common values:
      * Bq/ml (activity concentration)
      * g/ml (SUV)
    BoundingBox - The bounding box. If specified, only pixels 
      located inside the bounding box are thresholded, pixels 
      outside are ignored. If not specified the whole image set is 
      thresholded. The bounding box is defined by the minimum and 
      maximum corners, MinCorner and MaxCorner.
      Example:
         To consider the bounding box defined by the points (x_min, 
      y_min, z_min) and (x_max, y_max, z_max), set 
      BoundingBox={"MinCorner":{'x':x_min, 'y':y_min, 'z':z_min}, 
      'MaxCorner':{'x':x_max, 'y':y_max, 'z':z_max}}

CreateCylinderGeometry.description:
CreateCylinderGeometry(..)
  Create a cylinder geometry for the current ROI.
  Parameters:
    Radius - The radius (cm) of the cylinder geometry.
    Axis - The axis (cm) of the cylinder geometry in the DICOM 
      patient-based coordinate system.
    Length - The length (cm) of the cylinder geometry along 
      Axis.
    Examination - The examination where the geometry is created.
    Center - The center coordinate (cm) of the geometry in the 
      DICOM patient-based coordinate system.
    VoxelSize - The desired uniform voxel size (cm). Must be 
      between 0.01 and 1.0 cm. The default value is None which means 
      that a size dependent default voxel size is used. 
      Note that a explicitly setting a small voxel size for large 
      objects may lead to performance problems due to memory 
      limitations.

AdaptMbsMesh.description:
AdaptMbsMesh(..)
  Adapts an MBS mesh to the specified examination.
  Parameters:
    Examination - The examination.
    CustomStatistics - Custom graylevel statistics.
    CustomSettings - Custom MBS settings.

SetAsExternal.description:
SetAsExternal()
  Sets this region of interest as the external ROI. If an external 
  ROI already exists, it will be replaced by this one.

CreateExternalGeometries.description:
CreateExternalGeometries(..)
  Creates external geometries for the ROI on the specified 
  examinations.
  Parameters:
    ReferenceExamination - The reference examination.
    AdditionalExaminationNames - The additional examination 
      names.
    ReferenceThresholdLevel - The threshold level that 
      determines the outline. Set to None in order to automatically 
      calculate threshold value.
      This threshold level is used for all additional examinations 
      of same modality.

CreateMarginGeometry.description:
CreateMarginGeometry(..)
  Creates a margin geometry (expansion/contraction).
  Parameters:
    Examination - The examination.
    SourceRoiName - The name of the source region of interest.
    MarginSettings - The margin settings. Defines type (Expand 
      or Contract) and distances. All distances must be positive and 
      less than 15 cm.
      Example: MarginSettings = { 'Type': "Contract", 'Superior' : 
      0.0, 'Inferior': 1.0, 'Anterior': 1.0, 'Posterior': 0.1, 
      'Right': 0.0, 'Left': 2.3 }

CreateControllingRoiGeometry.description:
CreateControllingRoiGeometry(..)
  Creates controlling ROI geometry for a ROI geometry on a target 
  examination using a controlling ROI geometry on a reference 
  examination
  Parameters:
    ReferenceExaminationName - The name of the examination on 
      which the controlling ROI has a geometry defined.
    TargetExaminationNames - The names of the examinations on 
      which to create a controlling ROI geometry.
    RoiGeometryName - The name of the ROI geometry which the 
      controlling ROI should adapt to.
    SmoothingRadius - Applies a morphological close and open 
      with a structuring element of the given radius 
      (in cm) before creating / adapting the triangle mesh. If set 
      to 0, no smoothing will be done.

SetRoiMaterial.description:
SetRoiMaterial(..)
  Assigns a new material to this ROI. The material density will 
  override the ROI density for dose computation on all image sets.
  Parameters:
    Material - The new material.

TransformROI3D.description:
TransformROI3D(..)
  Performs a 3D transformation of the ROI
  Parameters:
    Examination - The examination where the geometry is 
      transformed
    TransformationMatrix - The transformation matrix
      Example:
        Move the geometry 1 cm in every direction
        TransformationMatrix = {'M11':1, 'M12':0, 'M13':0, 'M14':1,
                                'M21':0, 'M22':1, 'M23':0, 'M24':1,
                                'M31':0, 'M32':0, 'M33':1, 'M34':1,
                                'M41':0, 'M42':0, 'M43':0, 'M44':1}
                  
      The scaling of the transformation matrix must be positive
      The last row of the transformation matrix must be the 
      following: 'M41':0, 'M42':0, 'M43':0, 'M44':1

DeleteRoi.description:
DeleteRoi()
  Action for deleting an ROI.

VolumeThreshold.description:
VolumeThreshold(..)
  Threshold ROI geometry based on volume, i.e., keep components of 
  input ROI geometry having volume in interval [MinVolume, 
  MaxVolume] cm3.
  Typically used to clean up after a gray-level thresholding or 
  region-growing operation.
  Parameters:
    InputRoi - The input ROI.
    Examination - The examination.
    MinVolume - The minimum volume (cm3).
    MaxVolume - The maximum volume (cm3).

MultiSpectralThreshold.description:
MultiSpectralThreshold(..)
  Multispectral thresholding of examinations in a MR protocol 
  group. 
  For each examination, LowThreshold and HighThreshold should be 
  given. 
  The resulting segmented region will consist of points which are in 
  the given (examination specific) range for each examination.
  RoiGeometries will be created on each examination.
  Parameters:
    ExaminationNames - The examination names. All selected 
      examinations need to be in the same MR protocol group
    LowThresholds - The low thresholds - one for each of the 
      selected examinations
    HighThresholds - The high thresholds - one for each of the 
      selected examinations

CreateBoxGeometry.description:
CreateBoxGeometry(..)
  Create a box geometry for the current ROI.
  Parameters:
    Size - The size (cm) of the box geometry in the DICOM 
      patient-based coordinate system.
    Examination - The examination where the geometry is created.
    Center - The center coordinate (cm) of the geometry in the 
      DICOM patient-based coordinate system.
    VoxelSize - The desired uniform voxel size (cm). Must be 
      between 0.01 and 1.0 cm. The default value is None which means 
      that a size dependent default voxel size is used. 
      Note that a explicitly setting a small voxel size for large 
      objects may lead to performance problems due to memory 
      limitations.

CreateExternalGeometry.description:
CreateExternalGeometry(..)
  Creates an external geometry for the ROI on the specified 
  examination.
  Parameters:
    Examination - The examination.
    ThresholdLevel - The threshold level that determines the 
      outline. Set to None in order to automatically calculate 
      threshold value.

SetAlgebraExpression.description:
SetAlgebraExpression(..)
  Sets a derived ROI algebra expression. The expression is defined 
  with two expressions, ExpressionA and ExpressionB, and the 
  combination of these. Should be followed by UpdateDerivedGeometry 
  in order to create the geometry for a specific examination.
  Parameters:
    ExpressionA - Expression A. Operation must be Union or 
      Intersection.
      Example: 
        ExpressionA = { 'Operation': "Union", 'SourceRoiNames': 
      ["Roi A", "Roi B"], 'MarginSettings': { 'Type': "Expand", 
      'Superior': 1, 'Inferior': 1, 'Anterior': 1, 'Posterior': 1, 
      'Right': 1, 'Left': 1 } }
    ExpressionB - Expression B. Operation must be Union or 
      Intersection.
      Example: 
        ExpressionB = { 'Operation': "Intersection", 
      'SourceRoiNames': ["Bladder", "Prostate"], 'MarginSettings': { 
      'Type': "Contract", 'Superior': 0, 'Inferior': 0, 'Anterior': 
      0, 'Posterior': 0, 'Right': 1, 'Left': 0 } }
    ResultOperation - The final operation to apply between 
      ExpressionA and ExpressionB. If it is None, Expression B is 
      not used.
      Values:
        * None
        * Union
        * Intersection
        * Subtraction
    ResultMarginSettings - The margin settings to apply to the 
      result. Defines type (Expand or Contract) and distances. All 
      distances must be positive and less than 15 cm.
      Example: MarginSettings = { 'Type': "Contract", 'Superior' : 
      0.0, 'Inferior': 1.0, 'Anterior': 1.0, 'Posterior': 0.1, 
      'Right': 0.0, 'Left': 2.3 }

SetWallExpression.description:
SetWallExpression(..)
  Sets a derived expression representing a wall geometry. Should 
  be followed by UpdateDerivedGeometry in order to create the 
  geometry for a specific examination.
  Parameters:
    SourceRoiName - The name of the source region of interest.
    OutwardDistance - The outward distance, must be positive 
      and less than 5 cm.
    InwardDistance - The inward distance, must be positive and 
      less than 5 cm.

CreateSphereGeometry.description:
CreateSphereGeometry(..)
  Create a sphere geometry for the current ROI.
  Parameters:
    Radius - The radius (cm) of the sphere geometry.
    Examination - The examination where the geometry is created.
    Center - The center coordinate (cm) of the geometry in the 
      DICOM patient-based coordinate system.
    VoxelSize - The desired uniform voxel size (cm). Must be 
      between 0.01 and 1.0 cm. The default value is None which means 
      that a size dependent default voxel size is used. 
      Note that a explicitly setting a small voxel size for large 
      objects may lead to performance problems due to memory 
      limitations.

UpdateDerivedGeometry.description:
UpdateDerivedGeometry(..)
  Updates the derived geometry for the specified examination.
  Parameters:
    Examination - The examination.
    Algorithm - Defines if the logical set operations use 
      contour or voxel based methods. 
      Margins (expand/contract) and Wall operations are always 
      performed using voxel based methods.
                  
      Possible values:
      * Auto: Automatically select algorithm mode.
      * Contours: Use contour based methods.
      * Voxels: Use voxel based methods.
      Default value is "Auto".

CreateFieldOfViewROI.description:
CreateFieldOfViewROI(..)
  Creates field-of-view ROI on a CBCT or CT image
  Parameters:
    ExaminationName - The name of the examination on which a 
      field-of-view ROI geometry will be created.

DeleteExpression.description:
DeleteExpression()
  Deletes the derived ROI expression.

CreateITV.description:
CreateITV(..)
  Creates an ITV ROI from the geometries of a source ROI in 
  several examinations. 
  The ITV geometry is the union of the geometries in the source ROI, 
  with margins applied as a final step.
  Parameters:
    SourceRegionOfInterest - The source ROI, which must have 
      geometry in all provided examinations.
    ExaminationNames - List of examinations by name. These 
      examinations must be in the same 4D examination group.
    MarginSettingsData - Margins applied to the union of the 
      geometries of the source ROI in the provided examinations.

CreateDirectionalMarginGeometry.description:
CreateDirectionalMarginGeometry(..)
  Creates a beam specific margin ROI geometry by expansion in 
  distal, proximal and lateral directions relative either to the 
  chosen beam or to the chosen manual direction.
  - Note that there is no dependency between the resulting margin 
  ROI geometry and the source ROI geometry or the selected beam.
    If any of those are changed, the margin ROI geometry becomes 
  obsolete and must be regenerated.
  - Note that the margin distances are geometrical, not radiological.
  Parameters:
    Examination - The examination.
    SourceRoiName - The name of the source ROI.
    Beam - A beam defining the direction. Must be defined if 
      Direction is undefined.
    Direction - The direction in DICOM patient coordinates. 
      Must be defined if Beam is undefined.
    DistalDistance - The distal distance in cm.
    ProximalDistance - The proximal distance in cm.
    LateralDistance - The lateral distance in cm.

CreateAlgebraGeometry.description:
CreateAlgebraGeometry(..)
  Creates an algebra geometry.
  Parameters:
    Examination - The examination.
    Algorithm - Defines if the logical set operations use 
      contour or voxel based methods. 
      Margins (expand/contract) and Wall operations are always 
      performed using voxel based methods.
                  
      Possible values:
      * Auto: Automatically select algorithm mode.
      * Contours: Use contour based methods.
      * Voxels: Use voxel based methods.
      Default value is "Auto".
    ExpressionA - Expression A. Operation must be Union or 
      Intersection.
      Example: 
        ExpressionA = { 'Operation': "Union", 'SourceRoiNames': 
      ["Roi A", "Roi B"], 'MarginSettings': { 'Type': "Expand", 
      'Superior': 1, 'Inferior': 1, 'Anterior': 1, 'Posterior': 1, 
      'Right': 1, 'Left': 1 } }
    ExpressionB - Expression B. Operation must be Union or 
      Intersection.
      Example: 
        ExpressionB = { 'Operation': "Intersection", 
      'SourceRoiNames': ["Bladder", "Prostate"], 'MarginSettings': { 
      'Type': "Contract", 'Superior': 0, 'Inferior': 0, 'Anterior': 
      0, 'Posterior': 0, 'Right': 1, 'Left': 0 } }
    ResultOperation - The final operation to apply between 
      ExpressionA and ExpressionB. If it is None, Expression B is 
      not used.
      Values:
        * None
        * Union
        * Intersection
        * Subtraction
    ResultMarginSettings - The margin settings to apply to the 
      result. Defines type (Expand or Contract) and distances. All 
      distances must be positive and less than 15 cm.
      Example: MarginSettings = { 'Type': "Contract", 'Superior' : 
      0.0, 'Inferior': 1.0, 'Anterior': 1.0, 'Posterior': 0.1, 
      'Right': 0.0, 'Left': 2.3 }

CreateWallGeometry.description:
CreateWallGeometry(..)
  Creates a wall geometry.
  Parameters:
    Examination - The examination.
    SourceRoiName - The name of the source region of interest.
    OutwardDistance - The outward distance, must be positive 
      and less than 5 cm.
    InwardDistance - The inward distance, must be positive and 
      less than 5 cm.

SetRegistrationMatrix.description:
SetRegistrationMatrix(..)
  Sets the frame of reference registration matrix between two 
  frame of references.
  Parameters:
    FromExaminationName - The name of the from examination 
      that defines the from frame of reference.
    ToExaminationName - The name of the to examination that 
      defines the to frame of reference.
    TransformationMatrix - The 4x4 rigid homogeneous 
      transformation matrix. Must be composed of rotations and 
      translations only.

MBSAutoInitializer.description:
MBSAutoInitializer(..)
  Initialize MBS meshes.
  Parameters:
    MbsRois - The list of MBS models. Each item in this list 
      maps case type / model to ROI name and color.
      If CreateNewRois is false, RoiName must refer to an existing 
      ROI and RoiColor is ignored.
      Example: [{ 'CaseType': "PelvicMale", 'ModelName': "Bladder", 
      'RoiName': "Bladder_MBS", 'RoiColor': "Yellow" },
                { 'CaseType': "PelvicMale", 'ModelName': "Rectum", 
      'RoiName': "Rectum", 'RoiColor': "Brown" }]
    CreateNewRois - True if new ROIs should be created. If it 
      is false, each item in MbsRois must refer to an existing ROI.
    Examination - The examination.
    UseAtlasBasedInitialization - True if atlas based 
      initialization should be used.

GetAlgorithmSettingsForHybridDIR.description:
GetAlgorithmSettingsForHybridDIR(..)
  Gets the hybrid deformable registration algorithm settings used 
  when running "Create hybrid deformable registrations" from UI.
  The resulting HybridAlgorithmSettingsData dictionary can be used 
  as input parameter to the scriptable action 
  CreateHybridDeformableRegistrationGroup, either as is or modified.
  Parameters:
    ReferenceExaminationName - Name of the reference 
      examination.
    TargetExaminationName - Name of the target examination.
    FinalResolution - 
    DiscardImageInformation - If to discard image information.
    UsesControllingROIs - If to use controlling ROIs.
    DeformationStrategy - Name of the deformation strategy 
      ("Default" or "InternalLung")
  Returns:
    A HybridAlgorithmSettingsData object (dictionary with 
    settings name and value).

CreatePoi.description:
CreatePoi(..)
  Create a new POI.
  Parameters:
    Examination - The examination on which the POI will be 
      defined. If Examination is null, Point and Volume will 
      disregarded.
    Point - POI coordinates. Disregarded if Examination is null.
    Volume - Volume of the point [cm^3]. Disregarded if 
      Examination is null.
      In most cases a point has a zero volume, but if the point is 
      used to represent a detector for example, the volume can be 
      set to the volume of the detector.
    Name - The name of the new POI.
    Color - Display color of the POI. Use a color such as 
      'Red' or an ARGB value such as '#FFFF0000'.
    Type - ROI type. Possible values;
      * Marker: Patient marker or marker on a localizer.
      * Isocenter: Treatment isocenter to be used for external beam 
      therapy.
      * Registration.
      * Control: To be used in control of dose optimization and 
      calculation.
      * DoseRegion: To be used as a dose reference.
      * LocalizationPoint: Laser coordinate system origin.
      * AcquisitionIsocenter: Acquisition isocenter, the position 
      during acquisition.
      * InitialLaserIsocenter: Initial laser isocenter, the position 
      before acquisition.
      * InitialMatchIsocenter: Initial match isocenter, the position 
      after acquisition.
      * Undefined.

CopyRoiGeometries.description:
CopyRoiGeometries(..)
  Copies RoiGeometries between structure sets.
  Parameters:
    SourceExamination - The source examination.
    TargetExaminationNames - List of target examination names.
    RoiNames - List of ROI names.

SetMarginExpression.description:
SetMarginExpression(..)
  Sets a derived ROI expression representing a margin 
  (expansion/contraction). Should be followed by 
  UpdateDerivedGeometry in order to create the geometry for a 
  specific examination.
  Parameters:
    SourceRoiName - The name of the source region of interest.
    MarginSettings - The margin settings. Defines type (Expand 
      or Contract) and distances. All distances must be positive and 
      less than 15 cm.
      Example: MarginSettings = { 'Type': "Contract", 'Superior' : 
      0.0, 'Inferior': 1.0, 'Anterior': 1.0, 'Posterior': 0.1, 
      'Right': 0.0, 'Left': 2.3 }

GrayLevelThreshold.description:
GrayLevelThreshold(..)
  Gray level thresholding.
  Parameters:
    Examination - The examination.
    LowThreshold - The low threshold. The unit is in rescaled 
      pixel values, e.g. HU for CT. For PET images, PetUnit must be 
      specified.
    HighThreshold - The high threshold. The unit is in 
      rescaled pixel values, e.g., HU for CT. For PET images, 
      PetUnit must be specified.
    PetUnit - The unit for PET images. Common values:
      * Bq/ml (activity concentration)
      * g/ml (SUV)
    BoundingBox - The bounding box. If specified, only pixels 
      located inside the bounding box are thresholded, pixels 
      outside are ignored. If not specified the whole image set is 
      thresholded. The bounding box is defined by the minimum and 
      maximum corners, MinCorner and MaxCorner.
      Example:
         To consider the bounding box defined by the points (x_min, 
      y_min, z_min) and (x_max, y_max, z_max), set 
      BoundingBox={"MinCorner":{'x':x_min, 'y':y_min, 'z':z_min}, 
      'MaxCorner':{'x':x_max, 'y':y_max, 'z':z_max}}

CreateCylinderGeometry.description:
CreateCylinderGeometry(..)
  Create a cylinder geometry for the current ROI.
  Parameters:
    Radius - The radius (cm) of the cylinder geometry.
    Axis - The axis (cm) of the cylinder geometry in the DICOM 
      patient-based coordinate system.
    Length - The length (cm) of the cylinder geometry along 
      Axis.
    Examination - The examination where the geometry is created.
    Center - The center coordinate (cm) of the geometry in the 
      DICOM patient-based coordinate system.
    VoxelSize - The desired uniform voxel size (cm). Must be 
      between 0.01 and 1.0 cm. The default value is None which means 
      that a size dependent default voxel size is used. 
      Note that a explicitly setting a small voxel size for large 
      objects may lead to performance problems due to memory 
      limitations.

AdaptMbsMesh.description:
AdaptMbsMesh(..)
  Adapts an MBS mesh to the specified examination.
  Parameters:
    Examination - The examination.
    CustomStatistics - Custom graylevel statistics.
    CustomSettings - Custom MBS settings.

SetAsExternal.description:
SetAsExternal()
  Sets this region of interest as the external ROI. If an external 
  ROI already exists, it will be replaced by this one.

CreateExternalGeometries.description:
CreateExternalGeometries(..)
  Creates external geometries for the ROI on the specified 
  examinations.
  Parameters:
    ReferenceExamination - The reference examination.
    AdditionalExaminationNames - The additional examination 
      names.
    ReferenceThresholdLevel - The threshold level that 
      determines the outline. Set to None in order to automatically 
      calculate threshold value.
      This threshold level is used for all additional examinations 
      of same modality.

CreateMarginGeometry.description:
CreateMarginGeometry(..)
  Creates a margin geometry (expansion/contraction).
  Parameters:
    Examination - The examination.
    SourceRoiName - The name of the source region of interest.
    MarginSettings - The margin settings. Defines type (Expand 
      or Contract) and distances. All distances must be positive and 
      less than 15 cm.
      Example: MarginSettings = { 'Type': "Contract", 'Superior' : 
      0.0, 'Inferior': 1.0, 'Anterior': 1.0, 'Posterior': 0.1, 
      'Right': 0.0, 'Left': 2.3 }

CreateControllingRoiGeometry.description:
CreateControllingRoiGeometry(..)
  Creates controlling ROI geometry for a ROI geometry on a target 
  examination using a controlling ROI geometry on a reference 
  examination
  Parameters:
    ReferenceExaminationName - The name of the examination on 
      which the controlling ROI has a geometry defined.
    TargetExaminationNames - The names of the examinations on 
      which to create a controlling ROI geometry.
    RoiGeometryName - The name of the ROI geometry which the 
      controlling ROI should adapt to.
    SmoothingRadius - Applies a morphological close and open 
      with a structuring element of the given radius 
      (in cm) before creating / adapting the triangle mesh. If set 
      to 0, no smoothing will be done.

SetRoiMaterial.description:
SetRoiMaterial(..)
  Assigns a new material to this ROI. The material density will 
  override the ROI density for dose computation on all image sets.
  Parameters:
    Material - The new material.

TransformROI3D.description:
TransformROI3D(..)
  Performs a 3D transformation of the ROI
  Parameters:
    Examination - The examination where the geometry is 
      transformed
    TransformationMatrix - The transformation matrix
      Example:
        Move the geometry 1 cm in every direction
        TransformationMatrix = {'M11':1, 'M12':0, 'M13':0, 'M14':1,
                                'M21':0, 'M22':1, 'M23':0, 'M24':1,
                                'M31':0, 'M32':0, 'M33':1, 'M34':1,
                                'M41':0, 'M42':0, 'M43':0, 'M44':1}
                  
      The scaling of the transformation matrix must be positive
      The last row of the transformation matrix must be the 
      following: 'M41':0, 'M42':0, 'M43':0, 'M44':1

DeleteRoi.description:
DeleteRoi()
  Action for deleting an ROI.

VolumeThreshold.description:
VolumeThreshold(..)
  Threshold ROI geometry based on volume, i.e., keep components of 
  input ROI geometry having volume in interval [MinVolume, 
  MaxVolume] cm3.
  Typically used to clean up after a gray-level thresholding or 
  region-growing operation.
  Parameters:
    InputRoi - The input ROI.
    Examination - The examination.
    MinVolume - The minimum volume (cm3).
    MaxVolume - The maximum volume (cm3).

MultiSpectralThreshold.description:
MultiSpectralThreshold(..)
  Multispectral thresholding of examinations in a MR protocol 
  group. 
  For each examination, LowThreshold and HighThreshold should be 
  given. 
  The resulting segmented region will consist of points which are in 
  the given (examination specific) range for each examination.
  RoiGeometries will be created on each examination.
  Parameters:
    ExaminationNames - The examination names. All selected 
      examinations need to be in the same MR protocol group
    LowThresholds - The low thresholds - one for each of the 
      selected examinations
    HighThresholds - The high thresholds - one for each of the 
      selected examinations

CreateBoxGeometry.description:
CreateBoxGeometry(..)
  Create a box geometry for the current ROI.
  Parameters:
    Size - The size (cm) of the box geometry in the DICOM 
      patient-based coordinate system.
    Examination - The examination where the geometry is created.
    Center - The center coordinate (cm) of the geometry in the 
      DICOM patient-based coordinate system.
    VoxelSize - The desired uniform voxel size (cm). Must be 
      between 0.01 and 1.0 cm. The default value is None which means 
      that a size dependent default voxel size is used. 
      Note that a explicitly setting a small voxel size for large 
      objects may lead to performance problems due to memory 
      limitations.

CreateExternalGeometry.description:
CreateExternalGeometry(..)
  Creates an external geometry for the ROI on the specified 
  examination.
  Parameters:
    Examination - The examination.
    ThresholdLevel - The threshold level that determines the 
      outline. Set to None in order to automatically calculate 
      threshold value.

SetAlgebraExpression.description:
SetAlgebraExpression(..)
  Sets a derived ROI algebra expression. The expression is defined 
  with two expressions, ExpressionA and ExpressionB, and the 
  combination of these. Should be followed by UpdateDerivedGeometry 
  in order to create the geometry for a specific examination.
  Parameters:
    ExpressionA - Expression A. Operation must be Union or 
      Intersection.
      Example: 
        ExpressionA = { 'Operation': "Union", 'SourceRoiNames': 
      ["Roi A", "Roi B"], 'MarginSettings': { 'Type': "Expand", 
      'Superior': 1, 'Inferior': 1, 'Anterior': 1, 'Posterior': 1, 
      'Right': 1, 'Left': 1 } }
    ExpressionB - Expression B. Operation must be Union or 
      Intersection.
      Example: 
        ExpressionB = { 'Operation': "Intersection", 
      'SourceRoiNames': ["Bladder", "Prostate"], 'MarginSettings': { 
      'Type': "Contract", 'Superior': 0, 'Inferior': 0, 'Anterior': 
      0, 'Posterior': 0, 'Right': 1, 'Left': 0 } }
    ResultOperation - The final operation to apply between 
      ExpressionA and ExpressionB. If it is None, Expression B is 
      not used.
      Values:
        * None
        * Union
        * Intersection
        * Subtraction
    ResultMarginSettings - The margin settings to apply to the 
      result. Defines type (Expand or Contract) and distances. All 
      distances must be positive and less than 15 cm.
      Example: MarginSettings = { 'Type': "Contract", 'Superior' : 
      0.0, 'Inferior': 1.0, 'Anterior': 1.0, 'Posterior': 0.1, 
      'Right': 0.0, 'Left': 2.3 }

SetWallExpression.description:
SetWallExpression(..)
  Sets a derived expression representing a wall geometry. Should 
  be followed by UpdateDerivedGeometry in order to create the 
  geometry for a specific examination.
  Parameters:
    SourceRoiName - The name of the source region of interest.
    OutwardDistance - The outward distance, must be positive 
      and less than 5 cm.
    InwardDistance - The inward distance, must be positive and 
      less than 5 cm.

CreateSphereGeometry.description:
CreateSphereGeometry(..)
  Create a sphere geometry for the current ROI.
  Parameters:
    Radius - The radius (cm) of the sphere geometry.
    Examination - The examination where the geometry is created.
    Center - The center coordinate (cm) of the geometry in the 
      DICOM patient-based coordinate system.
    VoxelSize - The desired uniform voxel size (cm). Must be 
      between 0.01 and 1.0 cm. The default value is None which means 
      that a size dependent default voxel size is used. 
      Note that a explicitly setting a small voxel size for large 
      objects may lead to performance problems due to memory 
      limitations.

UpdateDerivedGeometry.description:
UpdateDerivedGeometry(..)
  Updates the derived geometry for the specified examination.
  Parameters:
    Examination - The examination.
    Algorithm - Defines if the logical set operations use 
      contour or voxel based methods. 
      Margins (expand/contract) and Wall operations are always 
      performed using voxel based methods.
                  
      Possible values:
      * Auto: Automatically select algorithm mode.
      * Contours: Use contour based methods.
      * Voxels: Use voxel based methods.
      Default value is "Auto".

CreateFieldOfViewROI.description:
CreateFieldOfViewROI(..)
  Creates field-of-view ROI on a CBCT or CT image
  Parameters:
    ExaminationName - The name of the examination on which a 
      field-of-view ROI geometry will be created.

DeleteExpression.description:
DeleteExpression()
  Deletes the derived ROI expression.

CreateITV.description:
CreateITV(..)
  Creates an ITV ROI from the geometries of a source ROI in 
  several examinations. 
  The ITV geometry is the union of the geometries in the source ROI, 
  with margins applied as a final step.
  Parameters:
    SourceRegionOfInterest - The source ROI, which must have 
      geometry in all provided examinations.
    ExaminationNames - List of examinations by name. These 
      examinations must be in the same 4D examination group.
    MarginSettingsData - Margins applied to the union of the 
      geometries of the source ROI in the provided examinations.

CreateDirectionalMarginGeometry.description:
CreateDirectionalMarginGeometry(..)
  Creates a beam specific margin ROI geometry by expansion in 
  distal, proximal and lateral directions relative either to the 
  chosen beam or to the chosen manual direction.
  - Note that there is no dependency between the resulting margin 
  ROI geometry and the source ROI geometry or the selected beam.
    If any of those are changed, the margin ROI geometry becomes 
  obsolete and must be regenerated.
  - Note that the margin distances are geometrical, not radiological.
  Parameters:
    Examination - The examination.
    SourceRoiName - The name of the source ROI.
    Beam - A beam defining the direction. Must be defined if 
      Direction is undefined.
    Direction - The direction in DICOM patient coordinates. 
      Must be defined if Beam is undefined.
    DistalDistance - The distal distance in cm.
    ProximalDistance - The proximal distance in cm.
    LateralDistance - The lateral distance in cm.

CreateAlgebraGeometry.description:
CreateAlgebraGeometry(..)
  Creates an algebra geometry.
  Parameters:
    Examination - The examination.
    Algorithm - Defines if the logical set operations use 
      contour or voxel based methods. 
      Margins (expand/contract) and Wall operations are always 
      performed using voxel based methods.
                  
      Possible values:
      * Auto: Automatically select algorithm mode.

      * Voxels: Use voxel based methods.
      Default value is "Auto".
    ExpressionA - Expression A. Operation must be Union or

    ExpressionB - Expression B. Operation must be Union or

      Example: 
        ExpressionB = { 'Operation': "Intersection", 
      'SourceRoiNames': ["Bladder", "Prostate"], 'MarginSettings': {

      0, 'Posterior': 0, 'Right': 1, 'Left': 0 } }
    ResultOperation - The final operation to apply between 
      ExpressionA and ExpressionB. If it is None, Expression B is

      Values:
        * None
        * Union
        * Intersection
        * Subtraction
    ResultMarginSettings - The margin settings to apply to the 
      result. Defines type (Expand or Contract) and distances. All

      Example: MarginSettings = { 'Type': "Contract", 'Superior' : 
      0.0, 'Inferior': 1.0, 'Anterior': 1.0, 'Posterior': 0.1,
